item.title: UX and Research
item.description: UX and Research Craft meets science in building better products. 52 Weeks of UX Really Good UX Nielsen Norman Group UX Myths Practical guide to user needs Tools, Resources, Blogs and Books Practical UX Methods Articles by UIE Work smarter, not harder Contextual Enquiry Primer Why Prototyping is a must NPS is a misleading metric Multivariate Testing
